text: Simon Arora (born 1969) is a British billionaire businessman. He is presently the CEO of the B & M retail chains. ==Education== He was born in November 1969. He was graduated from Cambridge University with a degree in law. ==Career== He started his career working as an analyst for a number of different companies like McKinsey, 3i and Barclays. ==References== Category:British businesspeople Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge
title: Simon Arora
